bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with fu zhong 浮腫 , floating swelling. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry yue wang yu suan 越王余筭：主水腫浮氣，結聚宿滯不消，腹中虛鳴，並宜煮服之 , “It controls water swelling and floating qi , nodular collections that abide, are sluggish and fail to be dissolved, and depletion rumble in the abdomen. For all this it is advisable to boil and ingest it”.

② Etiological Agent. identical with zhi qi 滯氣① , sluggish qi. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry su 蘇 quotes Ben cao hui bian 本草會編 : 紫蘇熟水第一，以其能下胸膈浮氣也 , “ Zi su maceration is best because it is able to make floating qi in the chest and diaphragm descend”.
